item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Keyset Cursors, Not Offsets, for Postgres Pagination (39 points | 12 comments)
2. Praise to scdoc to generate man pages (20 points | 13 comments)
3. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (4 points | 1 comment)
4. Speeding up Ruby by rewriting C in Ruby (40 points | 21 comments)
5. Structured binding upgrades in C++26 (8 points | 1 comment)
6. First impressions of the new Amazon Nova LLMs (via a new llm-bedrock plugin) (15 points | 4 comments)
7. NASA Graphics Design Manual (1976) (4 points | no comments)
8. Team Organization and Modular Decomposition (1 points | no comments)
9. Egoless Engineering (80 points | 13 comments)
10. A Brief Introduction to OCI Containers on FreeBSD (49 points | 19 comments)
11. The Cloud Container Iceberg (16 points | 4 comments)
12. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir and Membrane (2 points | no comments)
13. A complex bug with a ⸢simple⸣ fix (8 points | 13 comments)
14. The Hoare Cube (14 points | no comments)
15. The Tube Computer: wall-mounted 8-bit homebrew computer from vintage thermionic valves (31 points | 5 comments)
16. What's up with Lobste.rs blocking the Brave browser? (11 points | 13 comments)
17. Full-stack quantum computing, from hardware to compilers and algorithms (4 points | 2 comments)
18. PyMyFlySpy: track your flight using its headrest data (12 points | 3 comments)
19. AES-GCM and breaking it on nonce reuse (5 points | no comments)
20. You can’t get more adversarial than PvP MMORPGs (1 points | no comments)
21. Transferring Python Build Standalone Stewardship to Astral (28 points | 3 comments)
22. Why I Hate Language Benchmarks (7 points | 10 comments)
23. The Return of Procedural Programming (21 points | 14 comments)
24. The EYG Language with Peter Saxton (1 points | no comments)
25. Precomputation (19 points | 19 comments)
